intro: Force Field is a production-ready security gateway that sits directly in the execution path of AI systems. It provides real-time inspection, control, and enforcement for prompts, agent actions, and tool usage — without locking you into a specific model or vendor.
intro_closing: This is the foundation layer for runtime authority.

mcp_onramp.title: Mandatory MCP On-Ramp
mcp_onramp.description: Establishes a secure gateway where MCP-based agents obtain authorization and credentials before accessing enterprise tools and systems — creating a strategic control point for governing agent behavior at runtime.
